A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: his guards is one of the most badass moments in the entirety of the series. Same thing with Luke's final moment. The problem is\, that I felt both of these things (Luke dying & Rey & Kylo teaming up to defeat Snoke) would happen in Episode 9. Now what happens? I almost have no desire to watch the next film because the only real thing it could be about is Rey defeating or turning Kylo. This film could have easily been split into two films\, but instead we have to wait 2 years to see if JJ Abrams can  figure out a way to make the new story line interesting again
